page: NA40023: Analysis And Design Of Ocean Structures

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: The basic structural elements and loads in ship, offshore and other ocean engineering structures- Statically indeterminate nature of these structural elements; Analysis of statically indeterminate structures/structural elements; Consistent deformation method, Energy method; Matrix method - direct stiffness approach Matrix method applied to the analysis of offshore platform, ship deck idealized as grillage and other structures; Unsymmetrical bending of beams; Shear stress in beam of thin walled open section - shear center- Its application lure, container ship and floating dock; Design of welded steel structures; Design of tension member, beam and column; Built-up sections; Design of base plate and connection
page: NA40023: Analysis And Design Of Ocean Structures
